This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Changing font-size (a non-independent inherited property) in a way that results in an identical ComputedStyle still triggers a style recalc for its children. 
PASS Changing font-weight (a non-independent inherited property) in a way that results in an identical ComputedStyle still triggers a style recalc for its children. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
